sub_title: Looking for a full-time Marketing/Copywriting job from September/October
summary:
Hi! I'm Miya!

As a fresh graduate with a double degree in Business Management and International Business, I strive to bring a unique perspective to the world of marketing. With a passion for storytelling and a keen eye for business, I aspire to utilize the skills and knowledge I acquired throughout my academic years to create impactful content and drive business growth. Throughout my academic career, I have been actively involved in various marketing and communication roles, which have honed my skills in crafting compelling stories and building strong brand identities. Moreover, I have also gained a comprehensive understanding of how organizations operate and succeed in the global market. 

I have also recently picked up coding, not too much of an expert yet but I'm learning quickly! 

For my writing portfolio, please check out miyarchive.wordpress.com!

organizations.name: Gen Z: We Are The Future

profile_positions.description:
* Revised the Global Content Playbook, providing comprehensive guidelines for various international markets to ensure successful and uniform deployment of deliverables such as copies and assets.
* Developed the "generic assets" playbook, offering comprehensive guidelines for different markets worldwide to ensure consistent portrayal of Philips Hue's brand narratives, specifically through images, in Amazon's brand stores across the globe.
* Initiated and drove SEO optimization efforts to secure top-ranking positions for Philips Hue products across major search engines.
profile_positions.title: Global B2C Partnerships Intern

profile_positions.description:
* Analyzed courses and created comprehensive and accurate summaries.
* Identified the key takeaways and presented them in a clear and concise manner.
* Ensured that the summaries are written in a tone that is easy to understand and engaging for the learners.

Courses written: Innovation Management in Multinationals, International Financial Management
profile_positions.title: Writer

profile_positions.description:
Her Sphere is a non-profit young women-driven community with the vision to support the presence of young women with ambition. We aim to encourage Indonesian young women from all walks of life to dream big, grow, and rise together. Her Sphere provides a judgment-free, safe platform for women to support each other and access valuable knowledge.

We manifest our goals by actively spreading empowering content with our originally-made illustrations on Instagram (@hersphere_). We also enable all women to be seen, heard, and respected for their experience by offering inspirational and insightful programs including Through Her Thought (THT) and Her Side of Story.

Responsibilities:
* Created high-quality content, including articles, blog posts, social media posts, and other written materials that promote women's empowerment.
* Conducted research and stayed current with the latest trends and news on women's and youth empowerment.
* Collaborated with the team to develop content strategies that align with the organization's mission and goals.
* Edited and proofread content to ensure accuracy, consistency, and adherence to the company's style guidelines.
* Expanded the scope of the organization and composed one of the most viewed and interacted contents of the organization's social media.
profile_positions.title: Content Writer

company.name: Gen Z: We Are The Future

profile_positions.company: Gen Z: We Are The Future
profile_positions.description:
Gen Z is the most diverse generation to date. In today’s polarized world, Gen Z knows unity is more important than ever. Unlike the generations before us, we want to use our diversity to come together. That’s what Gen Z: We Are The Future is here to do: unite our generation so we’re ready to take on the challenges of the future, while also inspiring and educating our generation about the issues society is facing. Gen Z: We Are The Future is here to protect our future by ensuring that we are united, inspired, and educated.

Responsibilities:
* Researched and wrote news stories and feature articles on a wide range of topics related to global news and current events.
* Conducted extensive research through various sources to provide in-depth coverage and analysis of important issues.
* Monitored and stay up-to-date with the latest news and trends from around the world.
* Collaborated with the team to develop content strategies that align with the organization's mission and goals.
* Edited and proofread content to ensure accuracy, consistency, and adherence to the organization's style guidelines.
* Used social media platforms to promote content and engage with audiences.
profile_positions.title: Journalist

profile_positions.description:

* Played a crucial role in developing the organization's brand image and driving sales through effective and compelling copywriting in the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic.

volunteer_experiences.description:
* Built positive relationships with students and serve as a role model and advocated for their academic and personal success.
* Provided guidance and support to students in navigating the academic and social challenges of university.
* Helped students set academic and personal goals and develop plans to achieve them.
* Monitored students' academic progress and provided feedback and coaching to help them succeed.
* Connected students with resources and support services, such as tutoring and counseling, as needed.
* Assisted students in developing study skills and time management strategies.
* Served as a liaison between students and teachers, administrators, and other staff members to facilitate communication and support student success.
* Organized and facilitated workshops and events to promote student engagement and success.
* Maintained accurate records of student interactions and progress and provide regular reports to supervisors or program administrators.
* In charge of the conception of the performers' makeup and costume designs.

* Assisted the lead instructor in planning and preparing course materials, including lesson plans, assignments, and assessments.
* Provided support to students during class, including answering questions and clarifying concepts.
* Held office hours and provide one-on-one support to students who needed additional assistance.
* Maintained accurate records of student progress and attendance.
* Collaborated with other teaching assistants and faculty members to ensure a consistent and effective learning experience for students.
* Stayed up-to-date with developments in the field of business studies and brought new ideas and approaches to the classroom.
* Fostered a positive and inclusive learning environment that promotes student engagement and success.

* Developed and created visual materials, such as posters, flyers, and social media graphics, to promote school events and initiatives.
* Collaborated with teachers and administrators to design materials that effectively communicate information to students, parents, and staff.
* Maintained a consistent visual identity for the school across all materials.
* Stayed up-to-date with trends and best practices in graphic design and bring new ideas and approaches to the school's visual communications.
* Managed and organized the school's design assets and maintain a library of design files for future use.
